channel.title: welcome on The 5 Day Shenzhen Visa
channel.description: Recent content in welcome on The 5 Day Shenzhen Visa

item.title: Welcome to Shenzhen!
item.description: You are visiting or living in Hong Kong and like to have short trip to Shenzhen, but you have no visa? Easy, you can simply go to the border and get a Shenzhen-only visa that is good for 5days. This website will tell you how. It’s easy when done the right way.
